EmailTemplate.name: Remediation Item Assignment
EmailTemplate.Body: #if ($requesterName) $requesterName #{else} The system #{end} has assigned the following remediation item to you: $remediationItemName. This item is contained within the work item $workItemName.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying remediation item assignee that they have been assigned a remediation item.

Argument.name: remediationItem
Argument.Description: The RemediationItem that is being reassigned.

Argument.name: remediationItemName
Argument.Description: The description property of the remediationItem.

Argument.name: workItem
Argument.Description: The parent WorkItem of the RemediationItem being reassigned.

Argument.name: workItemName
Argument.Description: The description property of the WorkItem.

Argument.name: requesterName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that requested the assignment.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Remediation item assigned: $workItemName
